title: AMD may be sticking to a controversial choice with Ryzen 8000
description: AMD's Ryzen 7000 processors are still new, but it's already hard at work preparing the next generation -- Ryzen 8000.

title: Amazon plans ‘once-in-a-generation’ changes for Search, job ad reveals
description: Amazon is planning to jump aboard the generative-AI bandwagon by incorporating the technology into its search engine, a job listing reveals.

title: Asus fights to save face after a huge AMD Ryzen controversy
description: Asus has been the subject of a lot of controversy in the past couple of weeks, and its motherboards might be suffering for it.

title: Check out the latest version of Tesla Bot in video update
description: A new video from Tesla features the latest version of the Tesla Bot, the company’s humanoid robot that could one day be deployed insides its factories.
